oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PORT SIRE SELECTION ON COAST WITH RADIAL SANDBANKS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yan, Yixin
Yen, Kei
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: port
port site selection
radial sandbank
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Along the silty coast of the Jiangsu Province, it was found that on the coast stretch which we call the "Radial Sandbanks" coast stretch, deepwater port sites could be created if suitable tidal inlets were selected and provisions were made to maintain the required deepwater areas for port development.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
